mapper.select: SELECT CRE_ID, STORE_NM, CONTRACT_DT, PHONE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE FROm TBV_VIDEO_REQ_M TVRM WHERE STATUS = "COORDINATION" ORDER BY CRE_DTM DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBV_VIDEO_REQ_M (CRE_ID, STORE_NM, ADDRESS, CONTRACT_DT, CRE_DTM, PHONE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, NOTE, STATUS) VALUES (#{creId} ,#{storeNm}, #{address}, #{contractDt}, NOW(), #{phone}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{note}, 'COORDINATION')
